exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type sum, times : X -> X -> X zero, one : X M_sum : monoid_theory sum z sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v M_times : monoid_theory times o distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x b : X f : nat -> X Unable to unify "z ⊗ ?M1446 = z" with "z = b ⊗ z".

Found no subterm matching "∑ n' (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i)" in the current goal.

In environment X : Type times : X -> X -> X zero : X H : forall x : X, z ⊗ x = z sum : X -> X -> X one : X sum_comm : forall x y : X, x ⊕ y = y ⊕ x sum_cancel : forall x u v : X, x ⊕ u = x ⊕ v -> u = v distr_l : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊗ y ⊕ x ⊗ z distr_r : forall x y z : X, (y ⊕ z) ⊗ x = y ⊗ x ⊕ z ⊗ x b : X n' : nat f : nat -> X IH : ∑ n' (fun i : nat => b ⊗ f i) = b ⊗ ∑ n' f monoid_unit_l0 : forall x : X, o ⊗ x = x monoid_unit_r0 : forall x : X, x ⊗ o = x monoid_assoc0 : forall x y z : X, x ⊗ (y ⊗ z) = x ⊗ y ⊗ z monoid_unit_l1 : forall x : X, z ⊕ x = x monoid_unit_r1 : forall x : X, x ⊕ z = x monoid_assoc1 : forall x y z : X, x ⊕ (y ⊕ z) = x ⊕ y ⊕ z Unable to unify "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ b ⊗ ∑ n' (fun n : nat => f (S n))" with "b ⊗ f 0 ⊕ ∑ n' (fun n : nat => b ⊗ f (S n))".

original: induction n as [|n' IH]. - simpl. apply times_zero_l. - simpl. rewrite IH. rewrite distr_l. reflexivity.
